manshet.title: Global education with national values – at Mill Lyceum
manshet.subtitle: Learn IGCSE, A-Level, and National Curriculum programs on the same campus with experienced teachers

services_cards.services_text_1: The lyceum was established in 2015 with a license from the Ministry of Education; due to successful management, the Ministry of Economy granted it a permanent license – a unique status in the country.
services_cards.services_text_2: The school aims to combine national values with global competencies through a modern educational model and prepares students for top universities worldwide.
services_cards.services_text_3: Azerbaijani, Russian, and English departments; some classes are taught by expat teachers.

why_cards.section_description: Our selected services address students' diverse interests, combining high-quality teaching with practical skill-building.
why_cards.why_text_1: Students attend school from 09:00 to 17:00, with nutritious hot lunch and afternoon meals provided by the school.
why_cards.why_text_2: All uniforms, textbooks, and workbooks are provided; homework is completed at school under teacher supervision, reducing parental burden.
why_cards.why_text_3: Professional psychologist and nurse are always on-site; emotional well-being and basic healthcare are ensured within the school.
why_cards.why_text_4: Chess, robotics, drama, dance, football, karate, gymnastics and over 10 other activities – there's something for every student.
why_cards.why_text_5: Held in Ilgah and Mardakan for ages 4–16, featuring over 100 fun and educational activities in summer, fall, and winter.
why_cards.why_text_6: The school is an official Cambridge English test center; offers structured, result-oriented prep for PET, FCE, CAE exams.

how_apply_card.title: How to Apply?
how_apply_card.description: Ready to explore the wonderful world of education for your child?

steps.title: Online Application
steps.text: Our application process is designed for busy parents – simple, fast, and convenient. Just fill out the form to start your child’s journey.
steps.label: Step 1

steps.title: Admission Interview
steps.text: We’ll conduct a short meeting to assess your child’s suitability. The goal is to understand potential and alignment with our school values.
steps.label: Step 2

steps.title: Final Decision
steps.text: You’ll receive a final decision shortly after the interview, along with the next steps for enrollment.
steps.label: Step 3

corps_section.description: Our most popular campuses provide an ideal environment for education and development, tailored to different skills and interests.

faq_section.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq_section.description: This section is intended to answer the most common questions from users.

faqs.title: How do I create an account?
faqs.content: Just click the Sign Up button and fill in your details.

faqs.title: Are there prerequisites for enrolling in courses?
faqs.content: Yes, some courses have requirements. Check the course page for details.

faqs.title: Do you offer certificates?
faqs.content: Yes, you will receive a certificate upon successful course completion.

faqs.title: How do I interact with instructors and fellow students?
faqs.content: Our platform provides forums and a messaging system.

faqs.title: How can I submit feedback or suggestions?
faqs.content: You can share your feedback via the contact page.
